  • Method Details

    • acquire

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<Field> acquire(@NotNull @NotNull Class<?> type)
      Description copied from interface: FieldAccessor
      Retrieves a list of Field instances from the specified class that are relevant for processing. The returned fields are already accessible, eliminating the need to modify their accessibility using setAccessible(true).

      This method may filter fields based on certain criteria, such as annotations, access levels, or exclusion rules defined by the implementing class.

      Implementations are encouraged to cache the results of this method to enhance performance and reduce the overhead of repeated reflection operations.

      Specified by:
      acquire in interface FieldAccessor
      Parameters:
      type - the Class object from which to retrieve fields
      Returns:
      a List of Field instances that are relevant for processing

    • getCache

    • acquireThroughHierarchy

      public List<Field> acquireThroughHierarchy(Class<?> type)
      Retrieves all fields of the specified class, including fields from its superclasses, regardless of the access modifier (private, protected, public).
      Parameters:
      type - the class from which to retrieve all fields
      Returns:
      a list of all fields in the hierarchy of the class
